          <title>
            <string language="en">Transport of water in plants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Transport des Wassers in den Betrieben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transport de l'eau aux usines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transporte da água nas plantas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasporto di acqua in piante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά του ύδατος στις εγκαταστάσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transporte del agua en plantas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the movement of water through a plant. The process is facilitated by a water gradient between the soil and air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">leaf cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">root tips</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water transport</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">xylem</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bewegung des Wassers 
durch einen Betrieb. Der Prozeß wird durch eine Wassersteigung 
zwischen dem Boden und der Luft erleichtert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mouvement de l'eau 
par une usine. Le processus est facilité par un gradient de 
l'eau entre le sol et l'air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o movimento da água 
através de uma planta. O processo é facilitado por um gradient
da água entre o solo e o ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il movimento di acqua
attraverso una pianta. Il processo è facilitato da una pendenza
dell'acqua fra il terreno e l'aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μετακίνηση του ύδατος 
μέσω εγκαταστάσεων. Η διαδικασία διευκολύνεται από μια 
κλίση ύδατος μεταξύ του χώματος και του αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el movimiento del agua a
través de una planta. El proceso es facilitado por un gradiente
del agua entre el suelo y el aire.</string>
          </description>
